description: Students continue to develop the listening, speaking, reading and writing skills that enable them to deal not only with topics of daily life, but also cultural themes and authentic materials. Class meets four times weekly. Individual language laboratory visits are also required. Offered annually in the fall semester. Also counts toward Asian studies major and concentration. Prerequisite: JAPAN 112 or equivalent.
name: Intermed Japanese I
notes: Students in Japan 231B must also register for lab Japan 231 AL or BL.
title: Intermediate Japanese I
